Class TicTacToeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicTacToeGame

  • public class TicTacToeGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Java implementation of the tic tac toe game, using the Swing framework. This quick-and-dirty implementation violates a number of software engineering principles and needs a thorough overhaul to improve readability, extensibility, and testability.
